plot.description: Heatmap-style plot object to add heatmap legend for

fontsize.description: A numeric specifying text fontsize in points

scientific.description: Logical value specifying if numeric color value labelsshould be encoded in scientific format

digits.description: Numeric specifying how many significant digits to includeof numeric color value labels

ticks.description: Logical value specifying if tick marks on the heatmapcolorbar should be visible

breaks.description: A numeric vector specifying tick breaks

border.description: Logical value indicating whether to add a border aroundheatmap legend

x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying x-location of legend

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b" combinedwith a numeric value specifying y-location of legend

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying width of legend

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying height of legend

just.description: Justification of heatmap legend relative toits (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to use if\code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, or \code{height} are only given asnumerics

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} object containingrelevant function parameters
